title: Battery Watch Face Maker
summary: Customize your watch faces with colors and images in simpler ways.
description: This app works with all watches running "Android Wear" and suits watches with both round and square screens.Select your preloaded digital watch face style from "Android wear".Features:* Custom backgrounds - Choose any color as your watch face's background color. You can also choose a matching background image from a predefined set. It also allows you to choose images from your phone's image gallery and camera phone.* Text - Apply color of your choice to the text to make the watch face more clear and visible.* Battery - See the remaining battery % of your phone and watch on your watch face.* Notification - Get notified when your phone's battery reaches to a battery level specified by you.Note: After installing this app, you may have to wait a few minutes to allow the app to be synced to your watch before you can activate the watch face.
descriptionHTML:
This app works with all watches running "Android Wear" and suits watches with both round and square screens.

Select your preloaded digital watch face style from "Android wear".

Features:

* Custom backgrounds - Choose any color as your watch face's background color. You can also choose a matching background image from a predefined set. It also allows you to choose images from your phone's image gallery and camera phone.
* Text - Apply color of your choice to the text to make the watch face more clear and visible.
* Battery - See the remaining battery % of your phone and watch on your watch face.
* Notification - Get notified when your phone's battery reaches to a battery level specified by you.

Note: After installing this app, you may have to wait a few minutes to allow the app to be synced to your watch before you can activate the watch face.
comments: It's OK. Option to choose 12-hr format would be great.
